remarks: Closure of subspace orthocomplement for ` DVecH ` vector space. (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dochcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochcl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochcl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochcl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochcl.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochcl $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X C_ V ) -> ( ._|_ ` X ) e. ran I ) $.
